ENGLISH TRANSLATION (less or more precise):

Office 2003 Genuine Advantage Patcher - Gennaio 2007 - by CLoNY
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use this procedure to make Office genuine and to have access to Office Update.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Procedure
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


1.  Extract the file.

2.  Open the key generator (Keygen.exe).

3.  Click on "Generate" and leave the program opened.

4.  Start -> Run -> REGEDIT.

5.  Go to (find the folder):

      HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/Software/Microsoft/Office/11.0/Registration/.


6.  Make a backup of the original key (System Restore might also work?):
    Right-Click -> File -> Export...


7.  Rename the key "ProductID" in "OldProductID".

8.  Delete the key "DigitalProductID".

9.  Open any application of the Office suite (Word, PowerPoint, ...). You will be asked to register your copy of Office. Enter the key generated by Keygen.exe.

10. In your Internet browser, visit the page:

http://www.microsoft.com/genuine/

11. Click on "Validate Office" (on the right side)
    Install the official "Office Genuine Advantage" application to verify.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
R I G H T  TO  C O P Y  2007  -  ClonySoft
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
